mapper.insert: INSERT INTO SUBJECT (SUB_SEQ, SUB_CATEGORY, MAJOR_NUMBER, SUB_GRADE, SUB_SEMESTER, SUB_NAME, PROFESSOR_ID, PROFESSOR_NAME, SUB_INFO, SUB_ROOM, SUB_WEEK, SUB_S_CLASS, SUB_E_CLASS, SUB_MAX_STUDENT, SUB_NOW_STUDENT, SUB_POINT, SUB_REF, SUB_PARENT, SUB_STATUS) VALUES (SUB_SEQ.NEXTVAL , #{sub_category}, #{major_number}, #{sub_grade}, #{sub_semester}, #{sub_name}, #{professor_id}, #{professor_name}, #{sub_info}, #{sub_room}, #{sub_week}, #{sub_s_class}, #{sub_e_class}, #{sub_max_student}, 0, #{sub_point}, (SELECT NVL(MAX(SUB_REF),0)+1 FROM SUBJECT), 0, '개강')
mapper.select: SELECT SUB_SEQ, SUB_CATEGORY, MAJOR_NUMBER, SUB_GRADE, SUB_SEMESTER,SUB_NAME, PROFESSOR_ID, PROFESSOR_NAME, SUB_INFO, SUB_ROOM, SUB_WEEK, SUB_S_CLASS, SUB_E_CLASS, SUB_MAX_STUDENT, SUB_NOW_STUDENT, SUB_POINT, SUB_REF, SUB_PARENT, SUB_STATUS FROM SUBJECT WHERE PROFESSOR_ID=#{id} ORDER BY SUB_REF ASC, SUB_MAX_STUDENT DESC
